item.title: First Post !
item.description: Introduction to Python for Computational Biology In Computational Biology we briefly learned about Python and how it works alongside the programming language R. R is a great programming language because its functions are formatted so that data can be easily manipulated, analyzed, and visualized. Python has a useful library that imitates many essential features in R called Pandas. Below are some examples of code to demonstrate the similarities between the two popular languages.
